title: My graphics card supports shader 4.0 but when i enter a game I just see a black screen
body:
My graphic card supports shader 4.0 but it doesn't work......Help

I really want to play lol

replies.body:
First double check that you've got the latest driver updates for that graphics card, but if that doesn't seem it help it might be related to the resolution that's set for the in-game video settings. In that case, try running a quick config reset to make sure everything is in order there still.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
